name: Fractured (itch)
description:
Fractured is an illusion and glitch based puzzle game, with a story. Fight against the creator of the game!

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

Click - Throw Teleport Ball

Esc - Pause

Gameplay: 

Move through the game to reach the final fight and defeat the Creator! Break the game in the progress and make the Creator mad about you! Destroy his game to win! The game gets buggier the more you play!

All feedback is appreciated! (There is no sound, sadly)

This game was made in 72h for the Wowie Jam 2.0!
